import React, {useState} from "react"; import Navbar from "./NavBar"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function Inquiry() { const [gender, setGender] = useState("Female") const onOptionChange = e => { setGender(e.target.value) } return (

Selected gender {gender}

On Submitting you agreeing to our Terms & Condition.

) } export default Inquiry;
